1.title: The Gang Goes to Church

episode of.title: It's Always Cloudy in Barovia (TV Series 2018)

1.plot: After a fateful battle at Castle Ravenloft, the gang was unable to stop Rahadin from reincarnating the dreadlord using the body of Damian as a host. Now, Strahd Von Zarovich has returned, and Barovia falls into darkness once more. Gadget retreated from the castle, returning to the village of Barovia and finding it already under siege from Strahd's minions. Fending off the madness with the help of Astrapi and Verhoven, she took the bar as her own, renaming it to Gadget's Gadgets. Now just trying to get by in a world turned upside down, the gang is about to start a new ...

imdb.plot outline: The dreadlord of Ravenloft is dead and Barovia is freed from his curse. A hundred years have passed since then, and some semblance of peace has returned to the land. The people have returned to living life without fear of a tyrant ruling over them, and the once lonely valley flourishes with new travelers and new businesses. One of those businesses, a bar and inn named "Cragholder's", is run by four friends and heroes, who are now preparing to host an extravagant celebration for the 100th anniversary of "Devilsfell", the day when Strahd was slain.
imdb.title: It's Always Cloudy in Barovia
akas: It's Always Cloudy in Barovia (United States)
plot: The dreadlord of Ravenloft is dead and Barovia is freed from his curse. A hundred years have passed since then, and some semblance of peace has returned to the land. The people have returned to living life without fear of a tyrant ruling over them, and the once lonely valley flourishes with new travelers and new businesses. One of those businesses, a bar and inn named "Cragholder's", is run by four friends and heroes, who are now preparing to host an extravagant celebration for the 100th anniversary of "Devilsfell", the day when Strahd was slain.
